mapper.insert: INSERT INTO species(speciesno, grp, sname, cnt, seqno, visible, sdate) VALUES(SPECIES_SEQ.nextval, #{grp}, #{sname}, 0, #{seqno}, #{visible}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT speciesno, grp, sname, cnt, seqno, visible, sdate FROM species ORDER BY seqno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE species SET seqno=seqno-1 WHERE speciesno=#{speciesno}
UPDATE species SET seqno=seqno+1 WHERE speciesno=#{speciesno}
UPDATE species SET visible='Y' WHERE speciesno=#{speciesno}
UPDATE species SET visible='N' WHERE speciesno=#{speciesno}
mapper.select: SELECT speciesno, grp, sname, cnt, seqno, visible, sdate FROM species WHERE sname='--' AND visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT grp FROM species WHERE sname = '--' ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT speciesno, grp, sname, cnt, seqno, visible, sdate FROM species
WHERE (UPPER(grp) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(sname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM species
WHERE (UPPER(grp) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') OR (UPPER(sname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY seqno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE species SET cnt = cnt - #{cnt} WHERE grp=#{grp} and sname='--'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM species WHERE grp = #{grp} ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT speciesno, grp, sname, cnt, seqno, visible, sdate FROM species WHERE grp = #{grp} AND sname != '--' AND visible = 'Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT * FROM species WHERE visible = 'Y' AND grp = #{grp} ORDER BY sname ASC
SELECT speciesno, grp, sname, cnt, seqno, visible, sdate FROM species WHERE sname != '--' AND visible = 'Y' ORDER BY grp ASC, seqno ASC
